title: Video: Embers – Hollow Cage
content:
Mancunian quartet Embers do epic better than any other new band around at the moment.

This grandiose live take of Hollow Cage is far from U2 stadium-rock epic; more Sigur Ros, tender, crescendoing atmospheric beauty, building into an anthem of phenomenal proportions. Flourishing string sections and rousing swathes of reverb soaked guitars meld seamlessly into one, with the iconic backdrop of Manchester’s Gorton Monastery proving the perfect setting for Embers enticingly brooding sound. It’s considered, it’s cinematic, and above all, it’s bloody brilliant.
